frame.name: Body_description_holistic
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame covers descriptions of an entire human body, viewed as a gestalt (as opposed to descriptions based on salient body parts). The Frame Elements are <fen>Individual</fen> and <fen>Figure</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Ind">Chuck</fex> <m>is</m> <t>muscular</t>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Ind">Chuck</fex> has a <t>muscular</t> body.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Degree</fen> to which a body has a particular characteristic. <ex>Chuck is <fex name="Degree">rather</fex> <t>muscular</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Individual
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the individual (or individuals) being described. <ex><fex name="Ind">Chuck</fex> <m>is</m> <t>muscular</t>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Ind">Chuck</fex> has a <t>muscular</t> body.</ex> </def-root>

FE.name: Figure
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Figure</fen> or form being described by the target. <ex>Chuck has a <t>muscular</t> <fex name="Figure">body</fex>.</ex> </def-root>
